io.netty.handler.codec.socksx.v4

Class Socks4ClientEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToByteEncoder<Socks4CommandRequest>
          • io.netty.handler.codec.socksx.v4.Socks4ClientEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelOutboundHandler

    @ChannelHandler.Sharable
public final class Socks4ClientEncoder
extends MessageToByteEncoder<Socks4CommandRequest>
    Encodes a Socks4CommandRequest into a ByteBuf.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        protected void encode(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                      Socks4CommandRequest msg,
                      ByteBuf out)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: MessageToByteEncoder
        Encode a message into a ByteBuf. This method will be called for each written message that can be handled by this encoder.
        Specified by:
        encode in class MessageToByteEncoder<Socks4CommandRequest>
        Parameters:
        ctx - the ChannelHandlerContext which this MessageToByteEncoder belongs to
        msg - the message to encode
        out - the ByteBuf into which the encoded message will be written
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - is thrown if an error occurs
